events.name: Rates spike
events.blurb: Inflation print surprises. Financing gets harder and exit values compress.

events.name: Rates fall
events.blurb: Growth slows. The market prices in cuts. Values get relief.

events.name: New employer near campus
events.blurb: A major employer opens a hub. Demand rises and concessions tighten.

events.name: Port expansion
events.blurb: Distribution demand picks up. Industrial leases move fast.

events.name: Retail bankruptcies rise
events.blurb: Tenant credit deteriorates. Backfill costs spike and buyers demand yield.

events.name: Multifamily supply wave delivers
events.blurb: Lots of new units hit at once. Effective rent softens until absorbed.
